channel.title: Popos on A Developer's Experience
channel.description: Recent content in Popos on A Developer's Experience

item.title: Pop OS and Zorin on ARM64
item.description: When Mac M1 was released, I did not have the same displeasure like many others. In fact, I was hopeful that the vast majority of the apps and tools will be ready for M1 in no time. So, I got myself an M1 with no hesitation. Took a little while but everything from brew to big fat applications were ready. All seemed fine until I came around to play with Parallels and those Linux distros.
